name: Advantis Credit
notes: Collects for HMRC, DVLA, water companies, and energy suppliers.

name: Akinika Debt Recovery
notes: Owned by Capita. Collects for major retailers and government bodies.

name: ARC Europe
notes: Often collects for parking fines, health clubs (gyms), and finance companies.

name: Arrow Global
notes: Major debt purchaser. Owns Capquest and Drydensfairfax Solicitors.

name: BPO Collections
notes: Scottish agency collecting across the UK for Virgin Media, mobile networks, and energy firms.

name: Bristow & Sutor
notes: Enforcement agents (bailiffs). Primarily collects Council Tax and PCNs for local authorities.

name: BW Legal
notes: Legal firm specialising in debt recovery. Often deals with parking fines and energy debts.

name: Cabot Financial
notes: One of the UK's largest debt buyers. Purchases debts from banks, credit cards, and lenders.

name: Capquest
notes: Part of Arrow Global. Manages accounts for high street banks and credit card providers.

name: CCS Collect
notes: Collects for DWP, HMRC, water authorities, and eBay.

name: CDER Group
notes: Enforcement (bailiff) firm. Collects road traffic debts, council tax, and court fines.

name: CST Law
notes: Solicitors often used for collecting debts for Sheffield City Council and other commercial clients.

name: DCBL
notes: High Court Enforcement. Famous for 'Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away'. Collects parking fines and CCJs.

name: Debt Managers (Services) Ltd
notes: Rotherham-based agency collecting for utilities and telecom companies.

name: Drydensfairfax
notes: Law firm specialising in debt litigation. Often acts for Arrow Global and major banks.

name: Dukes Bailiffs
notes: Enforcement agents. Collects Council Tax, business rates, and commercial rent.

name: Equita
notes: Enforcement agents owned by Capita. Handles Council Tax and parking fines.

name: Eversheds Sutherland
notes: International law firm. Their debt team often pursues debts for major banks and HM Revenue & Customs.

name: High Court Enforcement Group
notes: Largest independent High Court enforcement company. Executes High Court Writs.

name: Hoist Finance
notes: Swedish debt purchaser. Operates in the UK primarily as 'Robinson Way'.

name: Intrum
notes: Europe's largest credit management firm. Previously known as 1st Credit in the UK.

name: Jacobs Enforcement
notes: Family-owned enforcement firm. Specialises in Council Tax and Business Rates recovery.

name: Just
notes: Enforcement and debt recovery. Often collects High Court Writs and commercial debt.

name: Lantern
notes: Specialises in purchasing and collecting payday loans and short-term credit debts.

name: LCF Law
notes: Law firm often instructed for utility debts and commercial disputes.

name: Link Financial
notes: Major purchaser of auto finance, credit card, and student loan debts.

name: Lowell
notes: One of the largest UK debt buyers. Owns Overdales (legal arm). Buys debts from Shop Direct, O2, and banks.

name: Marston Holdings
notes: The UK's largest judicial services group. Heavy focus on High Court enforcement and Council fines.

name: Moorcroft
notes: Very common agency based in Stockport. Collects for HMRC, DWP, energy firms, and high street retailers.

name: Mortimer Clarke Solicitors
notes: The legal arm of Cabot Financial. They issue CCJs for debts owned by Cabot.

name: Newlyn
notes: Enforcement agents. Specialises in collecting Council Tax, parking fines, and business rates.

name: Opos
notes: Scottish agency collecting commercial and consumer debts across the UK.

name: Overdales Solicitors
notes: The legal firm for the Lowell Group. Formerly known as Lowell Solicitors.

name: Pastdue Credit Solutions
notes: Collects heavily for energy companies (British Gas, SSE) and HMRC tax credits.

name: PRA Group
notes: Large US-owned debt purchaser. Buys credit card debts from banks like Barclaycard and MBNA.

name: Resolvecall
notes: Specialises in home visits (doorstep collection) to re-establish contact with debtors.

name: Robinson Way
notes: Trading style of Hoist Finance. Very common collector for retail banks and catalogues.

name: Ross & Roberts
notes: Enforcement agents owned by Capita. Focuses on local authority collections.

name: Rundles
notes: Enforcement agents providing services to local councils for tax and traffic debt.

name: The Sheriffs Office
notes: High Court Enforcement Officers. Authorised to enforce High Court Writs and recover property.

name: TM Legal Services
notes: Law firm often associated with lending companies like Perch Capital and ACI.

name: Wescot
notes: One of the UK's largest agencies. Collects for banking, utility, and telecoms sectors.

name: Whyte & Co
notes: Enforcement agents specialising in London and South East council tax and parking recovery.
